subject: Special Offer: 50% Off All Products!
body: Don't miss out on our biggest sale of the year! Get 50% off all products when you shop now. Limited time offer expires soon!

subject: Password Reset Request
body: Your account has been compromised. Click here immediately to reset your password and secure your account.

subject: Team Meeting - Project Updates
body: Hi team, we have our weekly project review meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 2 PM in the conference room. Please come prepared with your status updates.

subject: Support Ticket #12345 - Login Issues
body: Thank you for contacting support. We've received your ticket regarding login issues. Our team is investigating and will respond within 24 hours.

subject: Quarterly Sales Report
body: Please find attached the quarterly sales report for Q3 2025. The report shows a 15% increase in revenue compared to last quarter.

subject: FREE MONEY! Click Now!!!
body: CONGRATULATIONS! You've won $1,000,000 in our lottery! Click this link now to claim your prize! Act fast!

subject: New Product Launch Announcement
body: We're excited to announce the launch of our new product line. Schedule a demo with our sales team to learn more about how it can benefit your business.

subject: IT Maintenance Window Tonight
body: Please be aware that we will be performing scheduled maintenance on our servers tonight from 11 PM to 3 AM. Some services may be temporarily unavailable.

subject: Customer Feedback Survey
body: We value your opinion! Please take a few minutes to complete our customer satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us improve our services.

subject: Invoice #INV-2025-001
body: Please find attached your invoice for services rendered in July 2025. Payment is due within 30 days of receipt.
